name: Gravity Neon Rush
description:
Defy gravity in this retro-styled neon endless runner!


This is my first Unity game. It took exactly 1 month to make and I hope you will enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed making it :-D

Mac and Linux version are provided "as is" because I did not have an opportunity to test them.

Special thanks to Aleksandra Kovalyova for her invaluable feedback and ideas and to @Brackeys for his awesome tutorials (one of which became basis for this game).
